question: In an experiment to determine the figure of merit of a galvanometer by half deflection method... Resistance 5200 <katex>$\Omega$</katex>... 26 div... 90 <katex>$\Omega$</katex>... 13 div. The resistance of galvanometer is nearly
explanation: In half deflection method, <katex>$G = \frac{RS}{R-S}$</katex>. Here high resistance is in series, S is shunt.
Formula usually <katex>$G \approx S$</katex> if <katex>$R >> S$</katex>. Here <katex>$S=90$</katex>. Calculation yields approx 91.6.
